title: A new crazy rule is being made everywhere in the world
body:
http://orig13.deviantart.net/72c1/f/2013/282/4/4/nomad_by_jameszapata-d6pt6w8.jpg

The government has decided that people should be dived into two groups
Nomads and city born

Nomads can go wherever they wanna go but they cant stay long at the same place
City born cant leave the country/land they live on

Out of these two options which one would you take?

I myself let them choose for me 
See where it goes
mehehehehe!

http://img3.goodfon.su/original/1680x1050/7/df/art-imperial-boy-teikaku-122.jpg
